data.title: Silapathar, India to Luling, LA, USA
data.meta_description: Time conversion from IST (India Standard Time) (+5:30) to CDT (Central Daylight Time)(-5). Silapathar, India to Luling, LA, USA time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

IST (India Standard Time) is 10 hours and 30 minutes ahead of CDT (Central Daylight Time)

4:00 pm16:00 in Silapathar, India is 5:30 am05:30 in Luling, LA, USA

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 6pm-8pm in Silapathar which corresponds to 7:30am-9:30am in Luling
